analysis: Market analysis indicates negative pressure with sellers in control. RSI at 22.42 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 5.81 shows extreme selling pressure. MACD histogram negative with bearish crossover in effect. Price below Bollinger middle band, downside pressure present. Technical structure favors downside with price below key support levels. Ichimoku structure confirms bearish environment.
